title: india012
author: india012
content: TRX team is depugging their stable coin USDD to 1$  their is also some whale activity yesterday Same pattern is followed by the Luna before their crash what do you say should be sell our TRX coin now ?

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Not sure though about TRX.Maybe there are some whales trying to manipulate the price, and who knows, have that idea since the Luna and then FTX collapse, they might be thinking of doing the same thing with TRX.So the best thing to do is be very vigilant, just continue to monitor everything first before making any decisions, in my opinion.

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: india012 on November 10, 2022, 10:26:41 AMTRX team is depugging their stable coin USDD to 1$  their is also some whale activity yesterday Same pattern is followed by the Luna before their crash what do you say should be sell our TRX coin now ?  - Most of the crypto gambling in this field have not yet implemented this concept to include NFT in their platform, although there are some crypto gambling that does this most of them have not prepared it yet as far as I know.But I think in the future it can be adopted a little by various casinos here in the cryptocurrency industry. We just don't know how they will do it to make it more appealing to gamblers in the crypto world.
